content:
Hi,

The official Thunderbird and Mozilla support teams use a Knowledge Base / Help Center approach, which organizes all the information into articles grouped by topic.

A single, lengthy, traditional "user manual (PDF)" for Thunderbird for Android is not currently available.

You can search Thunderbird for Android Support
